unnormalised: Interesting transfers in the League! Will Chennaiyin FC's new striker, Rajesh Sharma, live up to expectations? R. Murali from Mohun Bagan seems a solid defensive addition. This season's transfers remind me of the plot twists in "Baazigar," you never know what's coming. Hoping for some on-field dhamaal! Rs. 50 Lakhs for a defender seems a bit steep, though. Jadavpur University's sports department must be following this closely.
